off-the-peg.translation[0].definitions[0: off-the-peg clothes are made in standard sizes, not made especially to fit one person
off-the-peg.translation[1].definitions[0: an off-the-peg arrangement, product etc is a standard one, rather than one designed for a particular person, situation etc
With travel insurance, you can get an off-the-peg policy for a single trip, or one tailor-made for the places you are likely to visit during a whole year.
